question: What courses are available at Aakash?
answer: Aakash offers courses for medical, and engineering entrance exams and scholarship exams such as NEET, JEE, Olympiads, NTSE and NSEs. You can take admission in one-year, two-year, three-year or four-year courses. You can download the latest prospectus here. (https://aakash.ac.in/prospectus).

question: Can I get a scholarship on Aakash courses?
answer: Yes, Aakash provides various scholarship programs based on merit and entrance exams.

question: How do I find an Aakash center?
answer: You can find the nearest Aakash center by visiting our website and using the center locator tool.

question: I have some questions regarding courses and the admission process. Can I talk to someone at Aakash?
answer: Yes, you can contact our support team through our website or visit any Aakash center for assistance.
